QuestionTxt: (Now I'd like to ask you about some things that have been happening in Iraq recently.  Not everyone will have heard about them.)...Since the start of military action in Iraq, about how many US (United States) soldiers have been killed overall?  To the best of your knowledge, have there been around 1,500, around 2,500, around 3,500, or around 4,500 military deaths in Iraq?
SurveySponsor: Pew Research Center for the People & the Press
SourceDoc: Pew Weekly News Interest Index Poll
